title: Volume of a solid with a known cross-section

content.prompt: Which of the following expressions gives the volume of the solid?

choices.label: 3 ∫ 0 4 ( y − y 2 ) 2 d y MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46A3@

3 ∫ 0 4 ( y + y 2 ) 2 d y MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4698@

3 ∫ 0 2 ( 2 x − x 2 ) 2 d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@471E@

3 ∫ 0 2 ( 2 x + x 2 ) 2 d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4713@

topic.text: 8.7: Volumes with Cross Sections - Squares and Rectangles

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
